thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-India's Lupin Dec Qtr Consol Profit Falls 65 Pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India's Lupin Dec Qtr Consol Profit Falls 65 Pct

organizations.name: lupin dec qtr consol profit falls

text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Lupin Ltd:
* DEC QUARTER CONSOL NET PROFIT AFTER TAX 2.22 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS PROFIT OF 6.33 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* CONSENSUS FORECAST FOR DEC QUARTER CONSOL PROFIT WAS 4.21 BILLION RUPEES
* DEC QUARTER CONSOL INCOME FROM OPERATIONS 39 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 44.05 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR Source text - bit.ly/2sbS8my Further company coverage:
